summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Dimeda Service Pro app - a service and maintenance application for Medirol Vivera Monobloc powered stretchers. All core functionalities tested successfully including products management, service records, issues management, and export features.
passed_tests: Product CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Product search by serial number and location
Issue reporting with all required fields
CSV export for products, services, and issues
Responsive UI elements and data-testid attributes
Calendar date picker for service dates
Dropdown selections for products, service types, issue types, and severity
